channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Disk_Image on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Disk_Image on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Disk_Image
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Disk_Image Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_Disk_Image data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer billing item for disk images. Local allowCancellationFlag Flag to check if a billing item can be cancelled. 1 = yes. 0 = no. Type: integer associatedBillingItemId This is sometimes populated for orphan billing items that are not attached to servers. Billing items like secondary portable IP addresses fit into this category.
